snippet: An armed man who was shot Monday by guards after crashing his S.U.V. while apparently trying to break into Little Rock Air Force Base has died.
lead_paragraph: An armed man who was shot Monday by guards after crashing his S.U.V. while apparently trying to break into Little Rock Air Force Base has died.

headline.main: Arkansas: Man Shot at Air Base Dies
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Man Shot at Air Base Dies
